root.description: Converts a geo-referenced DEM image into a general raster file compatible with OTB DEM handling.

parameter.name: Input geo-referenced DEM
parameter.description: Input geo-referenced DEM to convert to general raster format.

parameter.name: Prefix of the output files
parameter.description: will be used to get the prefix (name withtout extensions) of the files to write. Three files - prefix.geom, prefix.omd and prefix.ras - will be generated.
